ScriptItemPortable.SourceCode:
def Load(widget): entity = widget.Entity if entity == None: return
widget.View.Commands["Edit"].Visible = entity.Fields["STATUS"].Value == 2 widget.View.Commands["Delete"].Visible = entity.Fields["STATUS"].Value == 2 widget.View.Commands["CMD_RATEAR"].Visible = entity.Fields["STATUS"].Value == 2 widget.View.Commands["CMD_CONFIRMAR"].Visible = entity.Fields["STATUS"].Value == 2 widget.View.Commands["CMD_BLOQUEAR"].Visible = entity.Fields["STATUS"].Value == 1 widget.View.Commands["GRP_COMANDOS"].Visible = entity.Fields["STATUS"].Value == 2
